whatIsKam.question: What does KAM mean?
whatIsKam.answer: KAM is an AI chatbot named after the ancient Turkic 'kam' ‚Äî a wise shamanic figure who served as a bridge between the human and spiritual worlds. In this modern form, Kam embodies the same spirit of guidance, insight, and protection, helping users navigate the vast digital world with clarity and wisdom.

accuracy.question: How accurate are the restaurant recommendations?
accuracy.answer: Our restaurant recommendations come directly from Google Maps API, providing real-time ratings, reviews, and location data. We combine this with AI analysis to give you the most relevant suggestions based on your preferences.

coverage.question: Do you have information about all Istanbul districts?
coverage.answer: Yes! We have comprehensive data about all major Istanbul districts including Sultanahmet, Beyoƒülu, Kadƒ±k√∂y, Be≈üikta≈ü, √úsk√ºdar, and many more. Each district entry includes historical context, main attractions, and cultural significance.

languages.question: Can I get recommendations in different languages?
languages.answer: Yes! Our AI supports multiple languages including English, Turkish, Russian, German, French, and Arabic. Simply switch your language preference and start chatting.

updates.question: How often is the information updated?
updates.answer: Restaurant data is updated in real-time through Google Maps API. Our museum and attraction information is manually curated and updated regularly to ensure accuracy. We review and update our database monthly.

free.question: Is this service completely free?
free.answer: Yes! AI Istanbul Guide is completely free to use. We're funded by donations and maintain this as an open-source project to help visitors discover the best of Istanbul.
